4 | Create a Protocol Wanna share a cool protocol with your lab mates in this bookdown document? Follow this guide to learn how! First, you’ll need to clone this repository using Git in your terminal. #change directories to a desirable location cd ~/Desktop git clone https://github.com/OsburnLab/Protocols Next, open the bookdown-demo.Rproj file in RStudio. Then, select File > New File > R Markdown… Give this file a name in the format ‘number-name.Rmd’, where number is in sequential order with the other .Rmd files. Add an H1 element chapter title to the file. # | Chapter Title Next, add some paragraph content below this. # | Chapter Title Here is some paragraph content. To add a code chunk, equations, or figures, check out this link. Finally, render the book. bookdown::render_book("index.rmd", "bookdown::gitbook")
